EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Aerospace R&O Sites Upgrade SAP System
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://aerospace.honeywell.com/services> <https://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace>
Dear Honeywell Customer, Over the past two months we’ve shared with you our plans to upgrade our SAP systems at four R&O sites – Tempe, Arizona; Wichita, Kansas; Basingstoke, UK, and Shanghai, China. We are excited to say that we are on track for the Aug. 6, 2015, transition date. Just a quick reminder:
- Starting on July 31st, 2015, at 5:00pm (MST) through Aug. 6th, Honeywell will be unable to process new or existing R&O orders and product shipments. Orders received during this time will be placed in a queue for processing after Aug. 6th. - Orders received before and after this time frame may experience up to a two-week turnaround delay. - The Estimated Ship Date (ESD) function in the MyAerospace.com customer portal will not operate during this time, and will not reflect updated shipping data until the transition is complete. - For all Aircraft on Ground (AOG) issues, please contact the Honeywell AOG Team at 1-800-601-3099 (US/Canada) or 1-602-365-3099 (International), select phone option #4.
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact your Honeywell Customer Business Manager or send an email to AeroCPSCommunications@Honeywell.com <mailto:AeroCPSCommunications@Honeywell.com>. Yours Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace
